<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><catalog_conditions/><catalog_item/><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>100</order><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {

}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {

	//get the MRVS
	alert('running script');
    var team_mrvs = JSON.parse(g_form.getValue('ansible_tower_team'));
	var teams_list = [];
    // Loop through teams to create a team array
    for (var i = 0; i < team_mrvs.length; i++) {
        //check if the the job title matches
		teams_list.push = (team_mrvs[i].team_id);	
    }
	if(parent.g_form){
        parent.g_form.setValue('teams_list', teams_list);
    }

	
}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>Update teams</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>e663988</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-18 23:39:43</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>477824a71bd6e4505e72ebd5604bcb9d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update teams</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower" source="x_ibmss_gts_oar_at">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_477824a71bd6e4505e72ebd5604bcb9d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>e663988</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-18 23:39:43</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Ansible Tower Team">b4208a161b8668d45e72ebd5604bcb19</variable_set><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
